thread.title: Deonte Burton cocked back an alley-oop on this poor defender's head
thread.title_full: Deonte Burton cocked back an alley-oop on this poor defender's head

author: Kristian Winfield
title: Deonte Burton cocked back an alley-oop on this poor defender's head
text:
My goodness.
The Big 12 championship game between Iowa State and West Virginia was full of fittingly big moments, but none were more spectacular than Deonte Burton’s absolute pulverization of a defender with a vicious alley-oop finish.
With just over two minutes remaining in the Cyclones’ 80-73 upset victory over the Mountaineers on Saturday, Burton caught a lob pass before cocking back and unleashing a devastating tomahawk on a West Virginia defender .
Here’s another angle of the poster finish:
Deonte Burton. Get hyped, stay hyped. Dunk you very much. pic.twitter.com/cNu1ZdUYLv 
— Troy Machir (@TroyMachir) March 12, 2017
